title: KPD: Father charged after shooting son with pellet gun
content:
A Kingsport father who allegedly shot his son in the head with a high-powered pellet gun was arrested in Knoxville and charged with reckless aggravated assault, according to a press release.
On Jan. 8, the release stated Marco N. Bobo, 38, of 2005 Michelham Drive, was shooting a pellet rifle at targets placed across the street from his residence. During that time, he supposedly shot his 4-year-old child in the head causing serious injury, authorities stated.
